panels.description: Counters for spark jobs, these are cumulative over the lifetime of the spark-operator pod
panels.title: Spark Jobs Count

panels.description: Total number of successful and failed executors
panels.title: Spark Executor Health

panels.description: Total number of SparkApplication spark-submitted by the Operator per min
panels.title: Spark-submit Rate

panels.description: Start latency of SparkApplication, broken down by percentiles 99%, 90%, and 50%
panels.title: Start Latency Percentiles

panels.description: Percentage of Spark jobs with Running status out of the total submitted jobs.
panels.title: Job Running Rate

panels.description: Percentage of Spark jobs with Success status out of the total submitted jobs.
panels.title: Job Success Rate

panels.description: Percentage of Spark jobs with Failed status out of the total submitted jobs.
panels.title: Job Failure Rate

panels.description: CPU used by the spark operator and webhook pods
panels.title: CPU Usage (vCPU)

panels.description: Memory working set used by the spark operator and webhook containers
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes, broken down by percentiles 99%, 90%, and 50%
panels.title: Work Queue - Work Latency by Percentile

panels.description: Rate of additions to the work queue per min
panels.title: Work Queue - Add Rate

panels.description: Total number of retries handled by work queue.
panels.title: Work Queue - Total Retries

panels.description: How many seconds has the longest running processor for workqueue been running.
panels.title: Work Queue - Longest Running Controller Thread

panels.description: How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested in percentiles 99%, 95%, and 50%
panels.title: Work Queue - Queue Latency by Percentile

panels.description: How many seconds of work has been done that is in progress and hasnâ€™t been observed by work_duration. Large values indicate stuck threads.
panels.title: Work Queue - Unfinished Work
JVM Max Memory Pool Bytes Used (MB)

panels.description: 99th percentile of Kubernetes API server latency  summed by API server instance
panels.title: P99 API Server Latency

panels.description: 99th percentile of Kubernetes API server latency  summed by Verb.
panels.title: P99 API Server Latency by Verb

panels.description: Kubernetes API server request counts aggregated by verb and response code.
panels.title: API Server Request Count

panels.description: 99th percentile of Kubernetes API server Admission Webhook Latency summed by webhook name and action.
panels.title: P99 Admission Webhook Latency

panels.description: 99th Percentile of request latency between the Kubernetes API servers and etcd
panels.title: P99 ETCD Request Latency

panels.description: Size of the etcd database file physically allocated in bytes
panels.title: API Server Total DB Size

panels.description: The total number of SparkApplication CRDs in the cluster
panels.title: Spark Application Object Count

panels.description: The total number of Pods in the cluster
panels.title: Pod Object Count

panels.description: The total number of Nodes in the cluster
